it.polimi.dei.provafinale.carcassone.model
Class ModelTile

java.lang.Object
  it.polimi.dei.provafinale.carcassone.model.AbstractTile
      it.polimi.dei.provafinale.carcassone.model.ModelTile

public class ModelTile
extends AbstractTile

The class models the Tile. It contains informations of the 4 areas and 6 connections.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrea Canidio, Matteo Danelli

                            CardinalPosition relativePosition)
Check if the tile is compatible with the Tile passed in the cardinal position passed.

Parameters:
comparedTile - tile to compare with this.
relativePosition - position of this tile to compare.
